attributes.review:
Seriously, I thought this would be GOTY worthy, but upon launch I was immediately barraged with gameplay that I can only equivocate to POSTAL 2. This game should be taken off the market as it appropriates child violence, and running with scissors.

0/10 I thought it would be a hentai dating sim, but I guess looks can be deceiving.
attributes.title: Worst video game of 2020

attributes.review: this app is so awful 😔.... i had very high hopes😃, but immediately upon opening this app an orange🍊🤡told me to contract polio😷🤒🤕. so of course i did, because i would do anything for our great overlord🤡🤠. i then contracted polio 😷🦠which spread to my unvaccinated💉😧 child and killed us both. do you know how bad the wifi is in hell?😵🤬😡❌
attributes.title: this app made me DIE!!!! (not clickbait)

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it came to life from my phone. It started off by just running around, and it was very hard to catch. Then it pooped on my fridge and beat up my grandma; so rude! I would never recommend this app, even to the person that I dislike the most in the world. Absolutely terrible.
attributes.title: THE WORST

attributes.review: I decided to download the app to get information about the current presidential election and once I entered my phone number to sing up I started get spamed and I tried to go on the app settings to see what was wrong but everytime I tried it glitched and took me to my home screen!!!!! SUPPER MAD, SUPPER DISAPPOINTED 😡😡😡😡😡 !!!!!!
attributes.title: I would rate it -5 stars if I could...

attributes.review: I could not even get the app to open correctly, every time i would tap the app it would either glitch and close or freeze completely and i would have to restart my whole phone. Please take this app down it does not work properly.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review:
This app is horrible! It’s very slow and made my device glitch. My phone was overheating to the point where I could no longer use it without burning my hands. I expected this app to be “great,” but I’m very disappointed. Too glitchy, too slow, and gets my phone too hot.
AVOID!!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE! Expected better

attributes.review: at first i downloaded this app thinking it will be fun with a bunch of corrupted people. anyways after i opened the app, my phone started glitching and i had to power it off. the glitch didn’t stop until i deleted the app. i don’t want anything to happen to other people so please do not download this app!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THERE IS A VIRUS

attributes.review: This app is horrible ! I downloaded it and my phone Instantly started glitching and going into random apps ! Then it completely erased all of my information! After my phone turned off . I had to get my phone fixed due to a virus on this app! This is a Horrible app! Don’t download it 😐
attributes.title: My opinion

attributes.review: This app is will not let me in  or Let me delete it off my phone this needs to be taken of the App Store Immediately it is causing my phone to glitch in ways I have never experienced until downloading it please ban this app and delete it or I will be personally speaking to the manager and the ceo of this app
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I immediately got a virus (pretty sure Corona was the name of it), right after I downloaded this app. I was ticked because it was definitely the left wing trying to kill me, since I clearly wasn’t wearing a mask (I ain’t no ideut, falling for that socialist bs)! This must be a fake news app, made by the Chinese trying to steal my identity. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!! Anteefa doesn’t scare me! ‘MERICA!!!! Don’t be a sheep!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
